channel.title: CVE Feed for OpenText -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OpenText -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-4429|2024-05-28T14:38:18.675Z -- OpenText -- iManager
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery vulnerability has been discovered in OpenText™ iManager 3.2.6.0200. This could lead to sensitive information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2024-3969|2024-05-28T14:38:06.307Z -- OpenText -- iManager
item.description: XML External Entity injection vulnerability found in OpenText™ iManager 3.2.6.0200. This could lead to remote code execution by parsing untrusted XML payload

item.title: CVE-2024-2834|2024-04-08T12:22:49.221Z -- OpenText -- ArcSight Management Center
item.description: A Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability has been identified in OpenText ArcSight Management Center and ArcSight Platform. The vulnerability could be remotely exploited.

item.title: CVE-2024-2835|2024-05-20T13:10:08.716Z -- OpenText -- ArcSight Enterprise Security Manager
item.description: A Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability has been identified in OpenText ArcSight Enterprise Security Manager and ArcSight Platform. The vulnerability could be remotely exploited.

item.title: CVE-2024-3968|2024-05-15T16:39:39.515Z -- OpenText -- iManager
item.description: Remote Code Execution has been discovered in OpenText™ iManager 3.2.6.0200. The vulnerability can trigger remote code execution using custom file upload task.

item.title: CVE-2024-3483|2024-05-15T16:44:00.950Z -- OpenText -- iManager
item.description: Remote Code Execution has been discovered in OpenText™ iManager 3.2.6.0200. The vulnerability can trigger command injection and insecure deserialization issues.

item.title: CVE-2024-3482|2024-05-20T13:09:55.369Z -- OpenText -- ArcSight Enterprise Security Manager
item.description: A Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability has been identified in OpenText ArcSight Enterprise Security Manager and ArcSight Platform. The vulnerability could be remotely exploited.

item.title: CVE-2024-3485|2024-05-15T16:45:25.287Z -- OpenText -- iManager
item.description: Server Side Request Forgery vulnerability has been discovered in OpenText™ iManager 3.2.6.0200. This could lead to senstive information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2024-3484|2024-05-15T16:44:51.636Z -- OpenText -- iManager
item.description: Path Traversal found in OpenText™ iManager 3.2.6.0200. This can lead to privilege escalation or file disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2024-3488|2024-05-15T16:47:41.613Z -- OpenText -- iManager
item.description: File Upload vulnerability in unauthenticated session found in OpenText™ iManager 3.2.6.0200. The vulnerability could allow ant attacker to upload a file without authentication.

item.title: CVE-2024-3487|2024-05-15T16:47:07.862Z -- OpenText -- iManager
item.description: Broken Authentication vulnerability discovered in OpenText™ iManager 3.2.6.0200. This vulnerability allows an attacker to manipulate certain parameters to bypass authentication.

item.title: CVE-2024-3486|2024-05-15T16:46:03.081Z -- OpenText -- iManager
item.description: XML External Entity injection vulnerability found in OpenText™ iManager 3.2.6.0200. This could lead to information disclosure and remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-3970|2024-05-15T16:39:21.361Z -- OpenText -- iManager
item.description: Server Side Request Forgery vulnerability has been discovered in OpenText™ iManager 3.2.6.0200. This could lead to senstive information disclosure by directory traversal.

item.title: CVE-2024-3967|2024-05-15T16:40:10.253Z -- OpenText -- iManager
item.description: Remote Code Execution has been discovered in OpenText™ iManager 3.2.6.0200. The vulnerability can trigger remote code execution unisng unsafe java object deserialization.

item.title: CVE-2024-0622|2024-02-20T15:50:33.307Z -- opentext -- Operations Agent
item.description: Local privilege escalation vulnerability affects OpenText Operations Agent product versions 12.15 and 12.20-12.25 when installed on Non-Windows platforms. The vulnerability could allow local privilege escalation.

item.title: CVE-2024-0967|2024-03-01T14:26:09.689Z -- OpenText -- ArcSight Enterprise Security Manager
item.description: A potential vulnerability has been identified in OpenText / Micro Focus ArcSight Enterprise Security Manager (ESM). The vulnerability could be remotely exploited.

item.title: CVE-2024-1148|2024-03-21T07:34:35.081Z -- OpenText -- PVCS Version Manager
item.description: Weak access control in OpenText PVCS Version Manager allows potential bypassing of authentication and uploading of files.

item.title: CVE-2024-1470|2024-02-20T16:10:04.300Z -- OpenText -- NetIQ Client Login Extension
item.description:
Authorization Bypass Through User-Controlled Key vulnerability in NetIQ (OpenText) Client Login Extension on Windows allows Privilege Escalation, Code Injection.This issue
only
affects NetIQ Client Login Extension: 4.6.

item.title: CVE-2024-1811|2024-03-20T12:38:40.702Z -- OpenText -- ArcSight Platform
item.description: A potential vulnerability has been identified in OpenText ArcSight Platform. The vulnerability could be remotely exploited.

item.title: CVE-2024-1973|2024-03-25T21:27:43.774Z -- OpenText -- Secure Content Manager
item.description: By leveraging the vulnerability, lower-privileged users of Content Manager can manipulate Content Manager clients to elevate privileges and perform unauthorized operations.

item.title: CVE-2024-1147|2024-03-21T07:33:20.350Z -- OpenText -- PVCS Version Manager
item.description: Weak access control in OpenText PVCS Version Manager allows potential bypassing of authentication and download of files.

item.title: CVE-2024-5202|2024-05-23T19:11:44.819Z -- OpenText -- Dimensions RM
item.description: Arbitrary File Read in OpenText Dimensions RM allows authenticated users to read files stored on the server via webservices

item.title: CVE-2024-5201|2024-05-23T19:11:48.936Z -- OpenText -- Dimensions RM
item.description: Privilege Escalation in OpenText Dimensions RM allows an authenticated user to escalate there privilege to the privilege of another user via HTTP Request
